gist.headline: Models hitting the gym
gist.blurb: Introducing PolliBench! A new community tool to automatically benchmark our models against frontend coding challenges.
gist.summary: Added PolliBench to the Dev_Tools directory, enabling automated benchmarking of Pollinations models using HTML questions.
gist.impact: Developers can now access a dedicated tool to test and compare model performance on frontend tasks.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy pixel art lab scene. The bee mascot is holding a clipboard and a stopwatch. In the background, tiny pixel robots (representing models) are solving puzzles or lifting weights (metaphor for processing).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot holding a pixelated stopwatch and clipboard in a high-tech but cozy lab. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Tiny pixel robots in the background are solving puzzles on retro monitors. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'BENCHMARK'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
